address: Xã Minh Khai, Huyện Bình Gia, Tỉnh Lạng Sơn
thought:
**Analyzing the Administrative Reorganization of "Xã Minh Khai, Huyện Bình Gia, Tỉnh Lạng Sơn"**

Okay, so I've been asked to identify the new administrative unit for "Xã Minh Khai, Huyện Bình Gia, Tỉnh Lạng Sơn."  First, I need to confirm the province hasn't merged.  Checking the provincial merger resolution (60-NQ/TW) shows that Lạng Sơn remains unchanged.

Now, I'll delve into the relevant resolutions for Lạng Sơn, specifically looking at the "Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã" (reorganization of commune-level units) resolutions.  Resolution 1672/NQ-UBTVQH15 seems promising.

Scanning through that resolution, specifically line 10, jumps out at me:  It explicitly states that "Xã Hồng Phong" and "Xã Minh Khai" are being merged into a *new* "Xã Hồng Phong."  Therefore, based on this resolution, "Xã Minh Khai" is now part of the reorganized "Xã Hồng Phong."

To finalize this, I'll cross-reference this information with the list of "New wards."  I quickly find an entry that matches perfectly: {"ward_code":"06079","ward_name":"Xã Hồng Phong","province_name":"Tỉnh Lạng Sơn"}. This strongly confirms the conclusion.

To ensure absolute accuracy, I'll quickly glance over other relevant resolutions to avoid any confusion or ambiguities.  I'm looking for any other mentions of "Xã Minh Khai" that might lead to a different outcome. However, the other resolutions I reviewed all pertained to different provinces (Hà Nội, Cao Bằng, Hưng Yên, Hải Phòng, Thái Nguyên, and Tuyên Quang) and thus, are irrelevant in this case. None of these contain any conflicting information.

Considering the explicit wording of Resolution 1672/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 10, combined with the matching entry in the "New wards" list, I'm confident in concluding that "Xã Minh Khai, Huyện Bình Gia, Tỉnh Lạng Sơn" is now part of the newly formed "Xã Hồng Phong" within Lạng Sơn province.

citation.header: 1672/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lạng Sơn
citation.line: 10. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Hồng Phong (huyện Bình Gia)và xã Minh Khai thành xã mới có tên gọi là**xã Hồng Phong**.
